TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Point extends System.ValueType implements class System.IFormattable

summary.span: Represents an x- and y-coordinate pair in two-dimensional space.

span.span: Represents an x- and y-coordinate pair in two-dimensional space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 XAML，之间的分隔符并的值可以是一个逗号或空格。In XAML, the delimiter between the and values of a can be either a comma or a space. 某些区域性可能会使用逗号字符作为小数分隔符，而不是句点字符。Some cultures might use the comma character as the decimal delimiter instead of the period character. XAML 处理的固定区域性为 EN-US 在大多数 XAML 处理器实现中，默认设置，并且需要为十进制分隔符的段。XAML processing for invariant culture defaults to en-US in most XAML processor implementations, and expects the period to be the decimal delimiter. 应避免使用逗号字符作为小数分隔符，如果指定在 XAML，因为，将能与字符串类型转换的冲突属性值为和组件。You should avoid using the comma character as the decimal delimiter if specifying a in XAML, because that will clash with the string type conversion of a attribute value into the and components. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作等效于将添加到。This operation is equivalent to adding a to a . 请注意，调用方法才会起作用，如果可以更改和直接属性。Note that calling the method will only have an effect if you can change the and properties directly. 因为是值类型，如果引用对象通过属性或索引器，获取不到对象的引用对象的副本。Because is a value type, if you reference a object by using a property or indexer, you get a copy of the object, not a reference to the object. 如果您尝试更改或属性或索引器的引用上, 发生编译器错误。If you attempt to change or on a property or indexer reference, a compiler error occurs. 同样，调用属性或索引器上不会更改基础对象。Similarly, calling on the property or indexer will not change the underlying object. 如果你想要更改的值引用为属性或索引器，创建一个新，修改其字段，并分配回属性或索引器。If you want to change the value of a that is referenced as a property or indexer, create a new , modify its fields, and then assign the back to the property or indexer. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何偏移并的值结构。The following example shows how to offset the and values of a structure.
